This is Udacity React Native project by Di√≥genes Dauster. This app is bootstrapped using Create React Native App.

MyReads

A React application, allowing you to organize your book collection into three categories. This App was built with part of Nanodegree of Udacity about React.

Readable

This is the starter project of Udacity's Redux. Users will be able to post content to predefined categories, comment on their posts and other users' posts, and vote on posts and comments. Users will also be able to edit and delete posts and comments.

WearMarvel

Example using : WearableRecyclerView + WearableDrawerAction + WearableDrawerNavegation
